divs: Sighting DetailsWell I was at a friends house when we went outside to hang out. I seen in the sky a bright orange "star" I thought. My friend said that it wasn't a star and we argued for a few minutes. All of a sudden it started flashing slowly dimming and lighting back up from orange to almost disappearing. It was also moving from left to right just hovering there. After about 20 minutes of doing this it dimmed and we never saw it again.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Grant
There was one other sighting in Grant on or around April 10th 2012
